author: ROBERT BURNS
title: EXPLAINER: Does Putin's alert change risk of nuclear war?
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Russian President Vladimir Putin's implied threat to turn the Ukraine war into a broader nuclear conflict presents President Joe Biden with choices rarely contemplated in the atomic age, including whether to raise the alert level of U.S.
